v8:item.v8:content: Online support services are disabled to prevent conflicts with the main infobase. <link Unlock>Configure</>.
If you disable online support, the application will forget the support username and password.
Update classifiers from a file on a hard drive, from a network directory, or import them from 1C:ITS Portal.

It is recommended that you import the address classifier and keep it up-to-date to save bandwidth during auto completion and auto verification of addresses. You will need up to 2 GB on the hard drive.
Import exchange rates of the selected currencies for the specified period from 1C:ITS Portal.
It is strongly recommended that you select this check box to receive news from 1C Company. This ensures that you get important information from the technical support on a timely basis.
A summary of changes grouped by release version.
Group Application update Automatic check for updates1
Group Application update Update notification option
Priority when displaying information about available updates
The application will notify you whenever a new version is released.
The application will keep you informed about new builds of the current version during the support period. Even after the support period ends, you will be notified of new version releases.
Group Application update Automatic check for updates1
Receive patch data, download patches and install them in quiet mode (no manual actions required).
Update progress and deferred execution of additional data processing procedures.
Log details of the update progress.

<color #807A59>If you enable automatic validation, it might slow down document opening on slow computers. It is recommended that you use </><color #807A59>manual</><color #807A59> validation</><color #807A59> using the button in the "More actions" menu.</> <link e1cib/app/Processing.Instructions for using the Counter-agent test>More about the service</>
Evaluate counterparty reliability before you make decisions and minimize your tax exposure. <link https://portal.1c.eu/app/1spark-risks/>More about the service</>
Receive and send messages to texting apps, for example, Telegram or VK.

Allow usage of <link http://www.morpher.ru>Morpher</> declension service to get an alternative object presentation declension in grammar cases (Internet connection is required). If the external service is not used, presentation declension is carried out using the built-in application functionality.

Reports on application usage help us to determine what should be improved first. The collected data does not contain any personal information; it only contains statistics. Collecting and sending data will not slow down the application.
Allow automatic sending of application usage data to 1C Company
Allow sending data to a third-party
Update add-ins from a file on the hard drive or in a network directory or import them from 1C:ITS Portal.
View the list of third-party add-ins attached to the application.
Set up connection and data exchange with payment systems.
Templates are required to send mails and text messages with invoices to be paid via Faster Payments System.
Corporate chat with the ability to make calls, transfer files and remotely connect to a computer. First line support of 1C application users.
Configure application startup settings on this computer.
Allow to issue invoices via YooMoney and to receive information about payments.
Settings of issuing invoices and receiving information about payments via YooMoney.
Templates are required to send mails and text messages with invoices to be paid via YooMoney.
Update reports from a file on the hard drive, from a network directory or import them from 1C:ITS Portal.
The most recent platform distribution package is saved to the directory
Use automatic notification receipt from online payments
Auto-update interval for user news list, min
Autocomplete and verify non-imported addresses over the Internet
Check for and install updates automatically.
Send a message to technical support.
Manage news settings; manually update classifiers and the news list.
Update results and additional data processing
Update results and additional data processing
Set up connection to the Faster Payments System
Configure receiving and sending of messages to other texting apps, for example, Telegram or VK
Open Faster Payments System message templates
